review:
Dr.Najumudheen was very friendly and explained the whole process before starting. Answered all my questions and made sure that I'm completely aware of the procedure.

Also, made sure that I'm comfortable throughout the process.

Thank you Dr. Najumudheen

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Mr Najumudeen Ahmed is a super cool professional doctor , l was impressed with his knowledge and convincing confidence from the day 1 consultation.
Throughout the process of my various sittings for my root canal of 2 teeth simultaneously ,l felt comfortable and assured .
Thanks for planning a schedule that  fitted into my vacation visit to lndia. Have already recommended him to my family and friends and I am all set for a new  consultation for my teeth space correction braces!
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback, keep smiling.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: * ***** **** ****** * ******** ********* ********* ** **** ** ***** *** ****** *** ******** *** *** *** * ***** *** **** ********* ****** **** ** **** **** ** *** * ****** ***** ***** *** ******* ********* *********** **** **** **** ** **** ** ******** *** ******** ***** *** ***** *** **** *** ******* I had taken my 70 year old mother for a simple cavity cleaning and filling. they charged us Rs 1100 for a tiny filling claiming that the filling material was very special when it was just ceramic compound. **** **** ********* ******** ****** *** **** **** ** **** The dentist is a pleasing personality and takes time to explain the procedure and puts the patient at ease but I genuinely feel in the time of pandemic this is a very expensive consultation *** **** ********* ****** ********* ************  Needless to mention, we were made to come to different clinic and wait there for more than an hour.
reply_text:
1. Thank you for your valuable feedback

2. The consultation charges is 250 which I feel very less in Chennai living

3. All the tooth fillings will look tiny only (for you) but the material is same for us. The filling material was the light cure Ivoclar composite. I never compromise on my work. The following work was done,
          A. First the cavity was prepared for which I have to use all my autoclaved instruments where we doctors won't get the electricity for free to autoclave
          B. The tooth was isolated using rubber dam to avoid any salivary contamination for the life of the filling. 
          C. The 3M acid etchant was used
          D. The ivoclare bonding agent used
          E. The ivoclare high strength posterior composite was filled n polished

Note, all the materials come with GST for doctors n we don't claim this from our patients. The materials used were gold standard.

4. Yes you were asked to come to other clinic because there was a power shut down, feel happy that you were severed without ignoring.

5. I agree that you were made to wait for an hour because I was looking into other patient, just because you are waiting I can't leave his treatment half done.

6. The X Ray was taken to diagnose the problem ie whether the dental caries is deep involving the pulp of the tooth. I don't think doctors have X-ray in their eyes.

🙏 sir

tags: Doctor friendliness,

reply_text: Thanks for your valuable feedback. Thanks for giving me the opportunity. Your words are the real encouragement. ,👍🙏

review: Treatment for my pain in teeth I have visited 4 months ago. The down to earth approach by the dentist and team has made me to select the clinic for dental fixtures. The treatment given here is well  and good by dedicated team. I wish success in their efforts.  Regards  Dr Balakrishnan, N. Joint Director (retd) NCDC, BANGALORE
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable n positive feedback sir, this means a lot to me. Keep smiling.

review: Doctor just consulted and asked the help person to perform scaling . *** ***** *** **** **** ** *** ****** *** * ****** ** **** * ***** * He termed her as dental hygienist. They charged 1500 for this and I still have few more stains left and its day 2 now my teeth is super sensitive now with bleeding gums . During treatment the water was flashed all over my face . It was my most pathetic experience . It was a nightmare to visit .
reply_text:
Thanks for your feedback,  the dental hygienist- job is to clean (scaling) the tooth. Your tooth stains were hard to remove n it was covered all over the tooth surface especially front tooth, when we attend to do in front tooth the water flashes outside the oral cavity.
The sensitivity should settle in a couple of days.
The scaling usually takes 15 minutes but for you it took approximately 40 minutes. 
I’ll consider your feedback. Sorry for the inconvenience. Keep smiling. Reach me if you need any dental assistance.
